title: Beorcana
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023949/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023949/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Beorcana**

[Carl Crossgrove](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018023949/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Carl%20Crossgrove), 2006

Beorcana is a serifless roman, or modulated sans typeface family designed by Carl Crossgrove. Beorcana is designed for text, display, and fine print.

author: Stephen Coles
